TopicTitle: ''KSC we have a problem'' My mediocre attempt at making a KSP fiction (preview)

Articles.Content:
Date: 2059: Year 20 day 5

Location: Control room of the Interstellar ship Discovery named after the famous ship of 2001 and the first and proudest creation of the Alpha 1 Mars based manufacturing station

Destination: the K-124 system, discovered to have life 23 years ago by the LUVOIR space telescope, soon to have humans on its habitable world K-124 C

Status: Probe deployment

 

 

Edit (It should say probe deployment and data review.)
